name: Concentration in C3
description:
This is a Construct 3 remake of the original Blue's Clues Concentration, but with changes:
-There are now 20 cards instead of 12
-Modern characters are now in the game (Joe and Josh)
-CONSTRUCT 3!

Original game: https://archive.org/details/bluesclues_concentration
Nick Jr Website: https://www.nickjr.com
Construct: https://construct.net
